name: Do not talk to the cucumber
name_original: Do not talk to the cucumber
description:
[You are in the same room with a cucumber and are asked not to talk to him, but... the mute button doesn't seem to work correctly. And your chances of survival are decreasing every second...]

[Use arrows and spaces. Loud sounds and very strange gameplay are possible. Game for 18 minutes. Good luck.]

DO NOT TALK TO THE CUCUMBER
